revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:imported>Zorun|imported>Zorun]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD hAP |revision=ac 2
(RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC) |series=AC1200 |asin=B079SD8NVQ;US; |newegg= |price=69 |fcc_date=01/15/2018 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=access point, wireless router |fcc_id=TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND |pcb_id= |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVSM |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 10-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM |stock_boot=RouterBOOT; |stock_os=RouterOS;L4; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=64:D1:54,CC:2D:E0, |oui_eth=64:D1:54,CC:2D:E0, }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1200 Gigabit Access Point/Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2}} "MikroTik", "D52G-5HacD2HnD" and "hAP ac2 series" :is silkscreened on the board. 27dBm power, 2.5dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|MikroTik}} *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac 2 (RBD52G-5HacD2HnD-TC)]] (US) :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hap_ac2 '''hAP ac2'''] (tower case) - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND TV7RBD52-5ACD2ND] (2018-01-15) :5x GbE ports, PoE, USB 2.0, Wave 2 (2x2 2.4/5GHz) • [https://uloz.to/!KboRhNGccV6O/en-datasheet-hap-ac-2-tower-pdf PBrief] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @716MHz, 16/128MB • [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 MT forum] ===Amount of memory=== {{Notice |Early models (including the FCC filing) had '''256 MiB of RAM''', but newer models only ship with '''128 MiB of RAM''' (NT5CC64M16GP-DI RAM chip). This ''may'' be distinguishable with the additional '''/r2''' marking on the internal label.}} ===Reviews=== *[https://openwrt.org/inbox/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap_ac ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''OpenWrt wiki'''] ([https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_back.jpg PCB image] and [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/mikrotik/mikrotik_hap-ac2_front.jpg front internal image]) *[https://habrahabr.ru/post/351044/ ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''HabraHabr'''] (RU) ([https://hsto.org/webt/m9/b0/zo/m9b0zopdplsty9l9k45ccl3tvkc.jpeg internal images]) *[https://weblance.com.ua/374-obzor-hap-ac2-rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc-odin-v-pole-voin-i-alternativa-hex-hap-ac.html ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''WebLance'''] (RU) ([https://weblance.com.ua/uploads/posts/2018-05/1526226406_review_mikrotik_hap_ac2_rbd52g-5hacd2hnd-tc_pic17_cpu_ipq4018.jpg PCB images]) ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?t=129649 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:65135 ''MikroTik hAP ac2'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (RU) ([http://forum.ixbt.com/post.cgi?id=attach:14:65135:10:1.jpg internal image]) ===See also=== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac (RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT RB962UiGS-5HacT2HnT] ('''hAP ac''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB962-5ACT2NT TV7RB962-5ACT2NT] :Dual-Concurrent Tripple Chain 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x GbE ports, :POE-out on port 5, SFP, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: E4:8D:8C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz, QCA9880, 16/128MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac lite (RB952Ui-5ac2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB952Ui-5ac2nD RB952Ui-5ac2nD] ('''hAP ac lite''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C ([http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-i-testirovanie-hAP-ac-lite review]) :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac lite tower (RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC] ('''hAP ac lite tower''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP (RB951Ui-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951Ui-2nD RB951Ui-2nD] ('''hAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951UI-2ND TV7RB951UI-2ND] :5x FE ports, POE-out on port 5, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB, 24V/0.8A *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP lite (RB941-2nD-TC)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD-TC RB941-2nD-TC] ('''hAP lite''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB941-2ND TV7RB941-2ND] :4x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9412ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP lite classic (RB941-2nD)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD RB941-2nD] ('''hAP lite classic''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB941-2ND TV7RB941-2ND] :4x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9412ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP mini (RB931-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB931-2nD RB931-2nD] ('''hAP mini''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7931-2ND TV7931-2ND] :3x FE ports, 2T2R 802.11n, IC ID: 7442A-9312ND, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/32MB ==Images== File:MikroTik hAP ac2a.jpg|Main board File:MikroTik hAP ac2.jpg|Heatsink [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
